full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

*w0113-24CS26  Camp Loon - Camp Ground*

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of camping facilities at Camp Loon, a defence site located in Ontario, Canada.

### Request for Proposal Details

- **Reference Number:** WS4592107782
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4592107782
- **Modification Number:** 0
- **Publication Date:** 2024-05-18
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-07T14:00:00
- **Extension to Closing Date:** Please note that the original closing time has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on June 07, 2024.
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)
- **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19741774?extsite=MTk3NDE3NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19741774?extsite=MTk3NDE3NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Procurement Information

- **Trade Agreements:** Full recognition under Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) lists full text, including accreditation at See Dear Sir Trade listing C locations of win enlarg 
- **Legal Status:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- **Notices Category:** SRV
- **Criterions for evaluation:** Lowest Price
- **Contract Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

### Contact Information

For information regarding this tender, please contact Chui Stanley at PSPC by phone at [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Requirements

To meet the requirements of this tender, suppliers must submit their proposal through Ariba Discovery at the link provided above. Late submissions will not be accepted and will be declared non-responsive. Answer all questions
